summary: The twin sisters Helena and Irene are born in Helsinki during World War II. A few months later their mother, Sirkka, leaves the girls in the care of their grandmother, an old communist, and... See full summary »
cast: Elina Hurme|Tiina Weckström|Elena Leeve|Elsa Saisio|Vappu Jurkka|Jordi Borrell|Sari Havukainen|Inka Vogt|Unna Kitti|Per Ragnar|Jani Volanen|Sulevi Peltola|Tõnu Kark|Kristo Salminen|Eeva-Maija Haukinen|Raija Paalanen|Rea Mauranen|Vieno Saaristo|Anna-Leena Mäki-Penttilä|Rauha Puntti|Göran Schauman|Hannu Hartikainen|Rainer Kaunisto|Jarmo Hyttinen|Alexandre Zilberman|Istvan Galfi|Kristóf Lukácsfy|Hannele Röhr|Esko Nevapuro|Juhani Heikkinen|Kari Rissanen|Lidia Usvalahti|Armi Parkkinen|Sesam Tsokkinen|Kaisla Puurtinen
title: Tulennielijä
